body_html:
I managed to solve this by using these two fixes:

First, I changed the flags as described here: #1066 (comment). This alone did not fixed the problem.

Second, I reverted the standard string.h to 2.22 as mentioned in the same issue – the two comments just below the first one.

I don't know whether the first step was necessary.
body_text:
I managed to solve this by using these two fixes:
First, I changed the flags as described here: #1066 (comment). This alone did not fixed the problem.
Second, I reverted the standard string.h to 2.22 as mentioned in the same issue – the two comments just below the first one.
I don't know whether the first step was necessary.
body:
I managed to solve this by using these two fixes:

First, I changed the flags as described here: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/1066#issuecomment-200580370. This alone did not fixed the problem.

Second, I reverted the standard string.h to 2.22 as mentioned in the same issue – the two comments just below the first one.

I don't know whether the first step was necessary.
